content:
Nice: https://cauldron.io/project/3709

Level up Software Development Analytics - Cauldron
Cauldron allows project managers, analysts, and developers to understand more about the community and processes involved in software development
It's for Backdrop core ...this is a free service btw, and you can use it yourself ...all I've done was to add backdrop/backdrop and backdrop/backdrop-issues and let it analyse things.
...perhaps we can use that (or any such tool) to keep an eye on metrics/growth over time.
